title: Well of Memories
text:
Beneath [[Shae Mordai]] is the
deepest catacomb in [[Aerenal]]. It houses death records,
countless interred remains, and hundreds of [[spirit idol]]sâ€”each one preserving the sleeping soul of an [[elf]]. A ritual caster can awaken one of
these souls, and ask it questions on subjects it knew about in life.
